#@author Anurag
def dpc204(a, b):
    i_1 = 1
    i_2 = 0
    i = 1
    while i < a:
            i = i_1 + i_2
            i_2 = i_1
            i_1 = i
    n=0
    while i < b:
            n+=1
            #print i
            i = i_1 + i_2
            i_2 = i_1
            i_1 = i
    return n

def main():
    while True:
            a, b = map(long, raw_input().split())
            if a==0 and b == 0:
                    break
            print dpc204(a, b)

main()
